ygData.subject: RE: Grouping with PVP on non PVP servers
ygData.msgSnippet: The change included the inability to help them - which is how this thread started? You cant heal or buff +PvPer s if they group with you. And they can t/don t
ygData.messageBody:
The change included the inability to help them - which is how this thread
started? You cant heal or buff +PvPer's if they group with you. And they
can't/don't turn you "red" (anyomre :-)

And for a few weeks there - GM's were giving out "quests" to ppl who wanted
to switch back from +PvP to -PvP. IF you wanted to change back - you needed
to /petion and do what they told ya.

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 24th song
Spirit of the Moon
<new member and _very_ proud of it!>


-----Original Message-----
From: Donny Dane [mailto:ddane@...]
Sent: Saturday, September 11, 1999 1:41 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Grouping with PVP on non PVP
servers

From: "Donny Dane" <ddane@...>

Yeah, it used to be that way, right after release.

So yes, it used to be that way, but as
far as I know, it was changed about week 3 or 4 of release.
